extensionDescription.message: Control your Browsing History for Privacy and Performance

patternsDescription.message: Enter Patterns to keep future visits out of the History

byKeywordDescription.message: Search Keyword and maximum number of result to retrieve

startDescription.message: Number of days ago to start the search

endDescription.message: Number of days ago to end the search

maxDescription.message: Keyword search maximum number of results to retrieve

deleteRecentHistoryDescription.message: Number of hours to delete (from the Toolbar Menu)

autoDeleteDescription.message: Number of days ago to automatically Delete older History items

errorSize.message: File size is larger than the $1kb allowed

errorRead.message: There was an error with reading the file

errorParse.message: There was an error parsing the file

errorPattern.message: There is an error with the Pattern

errorPatternEnd.message: Patterns must start and end with / and no flags please

errorWildcard.message: No Starting or ending Wildcard please

errorShort.message: Very short patterns can have unexpected results

errorScheme.message: Only one * in the pattern scheme please

addedHost.message: Host was added to the Filter Patterns

amo.message: Firefox restricts some functions on some URLs

error.message: There was an error with the operation
